title: Status Effects
content: s unable to cast verbal Spells. Silvanus' Blessing Proficiency in Nature and Animal Handling. Sleeping A sleeping creature cannot move or act. Moreover, the creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws. Attack Rolls against it have Advantage, and any attack that hits the creature is a Critical Hit if the attacker is within 5ft of the creature. Slightly Drunk Just drunk enough for everyone to notice.
